MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK1 Postcode area of Falkirk. It will necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown to replace faulty electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.34AM on 3rd March 2021.
